FoldX — FoldX¶

This module provides YYYYY.

Module Syntax¶

Empty.

Module Contents¶

There is no function in this module.

FoldX Objects¶

class FoldX.FoldX¶

The FoldX class supports the following methods and attributes:

pdb_name¶

refers to a structure that should be mutated and analyzed without ‘.pdb’!

sequence_parent¶

the sequence of the pdb (pdb_name)

sequence_child¶

a mutated version of sequence_parent

repair_flag¶

indicates, if the pdb should be repaired at first

new_name¶

the name of the scored structure

Temp¶

the temperature of the experiment in K

pH¶

the pH of the experiment

Docstring missing.

Parameters:pdb_name – refers to a structure that should be mutated

and analyzed without ‘.pdb’!
